title: 1password integration doesn't work from credentials inside options
author: Ahmed-ElHamidy
body_snippet:
when you set the required 1password uuids (OP://vault/item) on the connection it works normally, but if you set it on the parent folder or on the credentials page in options, and leave the connection credentials contents empty, it acts as if nothing is configured.

===============================
windows 10 
mRemote NG V 1.78.2 (Nightly Build 3228) x64
===============================

comments.snippet: If **Inheritance** is turned on, the fields should not be displayed on connection level. Maybe something is wrong with **Inheritance** setting in your case for specific connection. Can you please send print-screen of Inheritance setting for your non-working connection.
comments.author: igor2x

comments.snippet:
sorry i was moving in from the release version (1.76.20.24615) which doesn't need any change on those to use credentials from the credentials page in settings.
will do more testing on the nightly build and comeback to you with updated findings.

attached my current settings that work on release, and same setup on nightly doesn't behave the same.
note I only filled the api key in as can be seen in the screenshots.
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cb7cd5e9-9998-4161-90a2-13fab54...
comments.author: Ahmed-ElHamidy

comments.snippet:
I managed to test a bit more, one thing works and another i couldn't get it to work
will start with what is working for me:
when I set the correct inheritance attributes, the children take the parameters properly from their parents

what doesn't work (as far as my understanding of the inheritance goes)
the settings credentials don't get used regardless what i do in inheritance (issue title updated to reflect latest finding)
comments.author: Ahmed-ElHamidy

comments.snippet:
